title: Enterprise-ready subscription management
review: Chargebee has been instrumental in scaling our subscription business. The flexibility in handling various billing scenarios, from simple monthly plans to complex usage-based pricing, is impressive. The analytics and reporting have given us insights we never had before.

title: Streamlined our billing operations
review: After years of manual invoicing, Chargebee automated everything. The dunning management alone has recovered significant revenue. Implementation took some effort but the long-term benefits are clear.

title: Robust platform for SaaS billing
review: We evaluated Recurly, Zuora, and Chargebee. Chargebee offered the best balance of features and pricing for our mid-market SaaS. The customer portal and self-service options reduced our support load significantly.

title: Solid but requires investment in learning
review: Chargebee is powerful but not immediately intuitive. We needed to invest time in understanding the data model and best practices. Once configured properly, it runs smoothly with minimal intervention.

Good subscription billing tool. Works well for our needs though the pricing gets expensive as you scale. The Stripe integration is seamless and the revenue recognition features are helpful for accounting.
